scripts.build: npm run client-build && npm run server-build
scripts.client-build: browserify            -g browserify-css -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread ] ] www/react/* www/store/* www/src/* www/utils/* www/mathutils/* -o www/bundle/dna_viewer_bundle.js
scripts.client-watch: watchify   --debug -v -g browserify-css -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread ] ] www/react/* www/store/* www/src/* www/utils/* www/mathutils/* -o www/bundle/dna_viewer_bundle.js
scripts.db-import: mongoimport -h ds011755.mlab.com:11755 -d dna_viewer -c datas -u dna_user -p dna_password --file  db/db.json
scripts.db-export: mongoexport -h ds011755.mlab.com:11755 -d dna_viewer -c datas -u dna_user -p dna_password --out   db/db.json
scripts.db-reset: npm run db-clear && npm run db-import
